skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: As a frontend developer with a passion for creating visually stunning and seamlessly functional user interfaces, I thrive on the ever-evolving landscape of web technologies.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: A seasoned backend developer passionate about crafting efficient server-side logic and managing databases. My dedication ensures the seamless functioning of applications behind the scenes.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: A Webflow developer who transforms creative visions into interactive and pixel-perfect web experiences. With a unique blend of design sensibility and technical expertise.

portfolio.title: TECHWELT
portfolio.description: Translated Figma design into React.js code for a user-friendly interface. Implemented features allowing administrators to add users and vehicles seamlessly. Developed functionality to track and maintain records of vehicles efficiently.

portfolio.title: MHR
portfolio.description: Designed and implemented a user-friendly frontend interface for admin to track guards' activities. Created a scheduling component allowing administrators to efficiently manage and assign guards' jobs. Frontend experience for admins interacting with the tracking and scheduling features.

testimonial.description: Transforming Figma designs into a seamless React.js interface, Ahmad excelled in creating a user-friendly experience.
They designed and implemented an incredibly user-friendly frontend interface that elevated our ability to track guards' activities.
